dict.acceptation: 贡献，捐赠，捐助；捐赠，捐助物；投稿，来稿；[军]（向占领地人民征收的）军税；

sent.orig: I would like to stop making regular contribution to my Special Voluntary Contribution Account.
sent.trans: 本人希望停止特别自愿性供款内的每月定期供款。

sent.orig: Prepare and develop product contribution analysis with the manufacturing plants in order to drive contribution improvements.
sent.trans: 与制造部门一起准备并生成产品份额分析以便进行份额优化。

sent.orig: Long term happiness is based on honest, production work, contribution and the self-esteem.
sent.trans: 长久的幸福基于诚实，创造性的工作，自控力和自信心。

sent.orig: That night, after school, I took our poor contribution to the school principal.
sent.trans: 那天晚上放学后，我把这点可怜的捐款送给校长。
